import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import './header-styles.scss' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/logo.svg' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase-utils' import CartIcon from '../cart-icon/cart-icon-component' import CartDropdown from '../cart-dropdown/cart-dropdown-component' import { selectCartHidden } from '../../redux/cart/cart-selectors' const Header=({ currentUser, isDropdownHidden }) => { return (
SHOP CONTACT { currentUser ?
auth.signOut()}> SIGN OUT
: SIGN IN }
{ !isDropdownHidden ? : null }
) } const mapStateToProps= ({ user: { currentUser }, cart: { hidden } }) => ({ currentUser: currentUser, isDropdownHidden: hidden }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
